Lightning_Bolt.display_help: The Clockwork can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.
Lightning_Bolt.display_target_help: The Clockwork can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

Tesla_Cage.display_help: You are trapped by a Tesla Cage. It does minor damage over time and drains your endurance.
Tesla_Cage.display_target_help: You are trapped by a Tesla Cage. It does minor damage over time and drains your endurance.

Summon_Clockwork.display_help: Babbage can summon a minion to fight at his side.
Summon_Clockwork.display_target_help: Babbage can summon a minion to fight at his side.

Lightning_Field.display_help: You have been trapped by Babbage's Lightning Field. You are taking minor damage over time and being drained of endurance.
Lightning_Field.display_target_help: You have been trapped by Babbage's Lightning Field. You are taking minor damage over time and being drained of endurance.

Ball_Lightning.display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.
Ball_Lightning.display_target_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area and also drains some Endurance from each target it hits.

Build.display_help: The Clockwork Paladin can become fully operational until it draws enough energy from a power source.
Build.display_target_help: The Clockwork Paladin can become fully operational until it draws enough energy from a power source.

Draw_Power.display_help: The Clockwork Paladin can become fully operational until it draws enough energy from a power source.
Draw_Power.display_target_help: The Clockwork Paladin can become fully operational until it draws enough energy from a power source.

Summon_Clockwork.display_help: The Clockwork Boss can summon a minion to fight at his side.
Summon_Clockwork.display_target_help: The Clockwork Boss can summon a minion to fight at his side.

Telekinetic_blast.display_help: Blasts a targeted foe, tossing him like a rag doll.
Telekinetic_blast.display_target_help: Blasts a targeted foe, tossing him like a rag doll.

Psychic_Scream.display_help: The Psychic Scream unsettles you, reducing your powers Recharge rate.
Psychic_Scream.display_target_help: The Psychic Scream unsettles you, reducing your powers Recharge rate.

Subdue.display_help: You have been Subdued and cannot move.
Subdue.display_target_help: You have been Subdued and cannot move.

Will_Domination.display_help: You have been Dominated and can do nothing. Any damage will break the hold on you.
Will_Domination.display_target_help: You have been Dominated and can do nothing. Any damage will break the hold on you.

Resistance.display_help: Clockwork Dukes are resistant to lethal damage and Disorient, but are vulnerable to psionic damage and Sleep.
Resistance.display_target_help: Clockwork Dukes are resistant to lethal damage and Disorient, but are vulnerable to psionic damage and Sleep.

Charged_Bolts.display_help: The Clockwork can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.
Charged_Bolts.display_target_help: The Clockwork can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.

Lightning_Field.display_help: You have been trapped by a Lightning Field. You are taking minor damage over time and being drained of endurance.
Lightning_Field.display_target_help: You have been trapped by a Lightning Field. You are taking minor damage over time and being drained of endurance.

Resistance.display_help: Clockwork Gears are formed from the broken parts of Prince Clockworks. They are weak and very loosely held together. They have no resistance and are pretty much vulnerable to most damage except lethal. They are particularly vulnerable to psionic damage, Sleep and Knockback.
Resistance.display_target_help: Clockwork Gears are formed from the broken parts of Prince Clockworks. They are weak and very loosely held together. They have no resistance and are pretty much vulnerable to most damage except lethal. They are particularly vulnerable to psionic damage, Sleep and Knockback.

Charged_Bolts.display_help: The Clockwork can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts from Gears deals light damage and but do not drains Endurance.
Charged_Bolts.display_target_help: The Clockwork can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts from Gears deals light damage and but do not drains Endurance.

Resistance.display_help: Clockwork Minions are weak, and vulnerable to most damage. The are, however, resistant to lethal damage and Disorient, and are very vulnerable to psionic damage, Sleep and Knockback.
Resistance.display_target_help: Clockwork Minions are weak, and vulnerable to most damage. The are, however, resistant to lethal damage and Disorient, and are very vulnerable to psionic damage, Sleep and Knockback.

Charged_Bolts.display_target_help: The Clockwork can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes. Charged Bolts deals light damage and also drains some Endurance.

Resistance.display_help: The Clockwork Princes are resistant to Knockback, Disorient, and lethal damage but are vulnerable to psionic damage and Sleep.

Reassemble.display_help: When the Clockwork Assembler falls, some of his parts can reassemble into tiny little Clockwork called Gears.
